text: Aur yeh log Allah kay siwa aisi cheezon ki ibadat kertay hain jo na unn ko zarrar phoncha saken aur na unn ko nafa phoncha saken aur kehtay hain kay yeh Allah kay pass humaray sifarshi hain. Aap keh dijiye kay kiya tum Allah ko aisi cheez ki khabar detay ho jo Allah Taalaa ko maloom nahi na aasmanon mein aur na zamin mein woh pak aur bartar hai inn logon kay shirk say
